channel.title: Data Analytics on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Data Analytics on FinanClub

item.title: PLTR
item.description: score:-34 Chances: Palantir is becoming widely adopted by large enterprises building out AI platforms. Palantir’s unique approach to customer acquisition is paying off in spades. Palantir’s AI prowess is years in the making. The data analytics powerhouse is up substantially in 2024 thanks to the growing adoption of AI.

item.title: AYX
item.description: score:4 Chances: Alteryx’s fair value estimate is US$56.24, indicating potential for upside. Appointment of Kevin Rubin as Interim CEO could bring positive changes to the company. Risks: Fierce competition from bigger rivals such as Microsoft and Oracle may pose a challenge. Setbacks in winning new business have suppressed Alteryx’s valuation.
